animals_lt.name: Alpaka
animals_lt.description: TThe alpaca (Vicugna pacos) is a species of South American camelid mammal. It is similar to, and often confused with, the llama.

animals_lt.name: Buivolas
animals_lt.description: Carl Linnaeus first described the genus Bos and the water buffalo under the binomial Bos bubalis in 1758; the species was known to occur in Asia and was held as a domestic form in Italy.

animals_lt.name: Haighland galvijai
animals_lt.description: The Highland (Scottish Gaelic: Bò Ghàidhealach; Scots: Hielan coo) is a Scottish breed of rustic cattle.

animals_lt.name: Kupranugaris
animals_lt.description: A camel is an even-toed ungulate in the genus Camelus that bears distinctive fatty deposits known as on its back. Camels have long been domesticated and, as livestock, they provide food (milk and meat) and textiles (fiber and felt from hair).

animals_lt.name: Danieliai
animals_lt.description: The use of the terms reindeer and caribou for essentially the same animal can cause confusion

animals_lt.name: Muflonas
animals_lt.description: The mouflon (Ovis gmelini) is a wild sheep native to the Caspian region from eastern Turkey, Armenia, Azerbaijan to Iran. It is thought to be the ancestor of all modern domestic sheep breeds.

animals_lt.name: Lama
animals_lt.description: The llama is a domesticated South American camelid, widely used as a meat and pack animal by Andean cultures since the Pre-Columbian era.

animals_lt.name: Strutis
animals_lt.description: Struthio is a genus of birds in the order Struthioniformes, whose members are the ostriches.

animals_lt.name: Velso ponis
animals_lt.description: A pony is a small horse (Equus ferus caballus). Depending on the context, a pony may be a horse that is under an approximate or exact height at the withers or a small horse with a specific conformation and temperament. A pony is typically under the height of 14.2 hands high.

animals_lt.name: Triušis
animals_lt.description: Rabbits are small mammals in the family Leporidae of the order Lagomorpha.

animals_lt.name: Juodasnukė avis
animals_lt.description: TThe Valais Blacknose, German: Walliser Schwarznasenschaf, is a breed of domestic sheep originating in the Valais region of Switzerland.

animals_lt.name: Zebras
animals_lt.description: Zebra (subgenus Hippotigris) are African equines with distinctive black-and-white striped coats
